member.name: T:Console.IO.IOCommands
member.summary: Commands that can be useful when working with filesystems

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.ListFiles(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lists files in the current directory Flag that specifies if the Search should be recursive. Only displays names

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.ListFiles(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lists files in the specified directory
member.param: Flag that specifies if the Search should be recursive.

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.ListFiles(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lists files in the specified directory and all subdirectories that match the search term
member.param: Flag that specifies if the Search should be recursive.

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.ListDirectories(System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lists files in the current directory Flag that specifies if the Search should be recursive. Only displays names

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.ListDirectories(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lists files in the specified directory
member.param: Flag that specifies if the Search should be recursive.

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.ListDirectories(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Lists Directories in the specified directory and all subdirectories that match the search term
member.param: Flag that specifies if the Search should be recursive.

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.Copy(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Copies a File from A to B

member.name: M:Console.IO.IOCommands.Move(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Moves a File from A to B
